course_title: Introduction to Writing for Children and Young Adults

001.comments: All CRWR Winter Term 1 (September-December) courses/sections will be held online. This particular course blends lectures, interactive discussions, and individual and small-group work. Instruction will be conducted entirely asynchronously on Canvas through videos, short readings, learning modules, and discussions that require students to be online for approximately three hours over the course of a 24-hour period. There will also be homework assigned for completion throughout the week. One-on-one office hours with your T.A. and professor Emily Pohl-Weary will be offered on Zoom or via email.

description: Techniques of and practice in creating, developing and writing for children and young adults. Manuscript submission is not required for admission.
